definition: very/completely/utterly/extremely/absolutely/hundred percent/to divide into ten equal parts

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: "Yinziwu" is warm in winter and cool in summer, making it a good place for living.
sentences.chinese: 洪江古商城的窨子屋冬暖夏涼，十分適宜居住。

sentences.english: It's proving very difficult to peg him down to a definite date for completion.
sentences.chinese: 要規定他限期完成確是十分困難的。

sentences.english: During the Jin dynasty, a boy, called Mao Bao, was born into an impoverished family.
sentences.chinese: 晉朝時，有一位名叫毛寶的小男孩，家境十分貧困。

sentences.english: His running is burning him up.
At that time, the public order in Dingxiang was very chaotic.
sentences.chinese: 當時定襄的社會治安十分混亂。

sentences.english: This painting of mottled bamboos is really true to life.
sentences.chinese: 這幅湘竹畫得十分逼真。

sentences.english: Learning how to striptease is not difficult.
sentences.chinese: 學習跳脫衣舞十分容易。

sentences.english: Therefore, the study on port-city relation is extremely essential.
sentences.chinese: 因此，研究港城關係是十分必要的。

sentences.english: Continuous existence of accommodation space led to well-developed lacustrine transgressive system tracts(LTST).
sentences.chinese: 可容空間持續存在，導致湖侵體系域十分發育。

sentences.english: In opening wider to the outside world, we must pay great attention to safeguarding our national economic security.
sentences.chinese: 在擴大對外開放中，要十分注意維護國家經濟安全。

sentences.english: The results are appliable for design of nonel circuit.
sentences.chinese: 這些研究成果對非電爆破網絡設計十分有用。

sentences.english: Piscine mouth shoe, afterwards follow on current goes this year, if show, toe is like concealed, very sexy.
sentences.chinese: 魚嘴鞋，今年繼續流行，腳趾若隱若現，十分性感。

sentences.english: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.chinese: 這首詩在當時十分流行。

sentences.english: My grandma is very good at weaving baskets with bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 我的艿艿十分擅長用竹子編籃筐。
雨後的道路變得十分難走。

sentences.english: Our intelligent crime has been very outstanding.
sentences.chinese: 我國的智能化犯罪已經十分突出。
